content:
There are two enemy ships in the Black Sea waters, including two carriers of the Caliber Winged missiles, up to 8 rockets.

About thisreportedNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

There are no enemy ships in the Sea of Azov.

In the Mediterranean, there are two enemy ships, including one carpet carrier "Caliber", a total volley of up to 8 rockets.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation, 18 ships passed the Kerch Strait to the Azov Sea, 6 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait.

10 vessels were passed to the Black Sea, one of them continued to move in the direction of the Bosphorus.

"The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (SOLAS), turning off automatic identification systems (AIS)," the Navy emphasized.

As reported by the Armyinfrom, March 21 after a monthly pause Russiabrought to the Black Seasubmarines with winged rockets.
title: The Navy of the Armed Forces reported the number of enemy rocket launchers in the Black Sea
description: This was reported by the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. In the Sea of Azov enemy ships ...
author: Army Inform
